com.gemalto.idp.mobile.otp.provisioning

Interface DskppServerPinCallback


  • public interface DskppServerPinCallback
    Passed to the DskppProvisioningCallback.onServerPinRequested(String, DskppPinPolicy, DskppServerPinCallback) in order to let the the client respond on the callback with one of the supported actions - the soft PIN entry or cancel.
    Since:
    4.1

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void onPinEntered(PinAuthInput serverPin, PinAuthInput userPin)
      Informs the provisioning process that the soft PIN entry completed with the PIN value.
      void onPinEntryCancelled()
      Notifies the provisioning process that the soft PIN entry was cancelled and therefore the entire provisioning process aborts.

    • Method Detail

      • onPinEntered

        void onPinEntered(PinAuthInput serverPin,
                  PinAuthInput userPin)
        Informs the provisioning process that the soft PIN entry completed with the PIN value.
        Parameters:
        serverPin - The server PIN that will be send to the server. Never null
        userPin - The user PIN value. Never null.
        Since:
        4.1

      • onPinEntryCancelled

        void onPinEntryCancelled()
        Notifies the provisioning process that the soft PIN entry was cancelled and therefore the entire provisioning process aborts. IdpNetworkException is thrown when it is aborted.
        Since:
        4.1
